title: Flex is such a joke :/ there no balance
body: Basically if your in silver or gold whoever gets the most platinum/diamonds win the game every single time, 1 diamond can outplay an entire gold team :/ its actually quite  a joke of queue without having some limiting factor to 5v5 skill gap :/ and of course the diamond is more than happy to stay gold in flex because its not normal and its not solo but they can play with friends.

replies.body: I am currently soloing flex. Have not had this problem at all. I will get back to you if this ever changes.
Not any worse than the mess of smurfs, feeders, crying riven mains and afks in any other ranked queue.
Why do you think most people don't play it.
